00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_FILE_OBSERVER_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_FILE_OBSERVER_H_
00031 
00032 #include "mimas/mimas.h"
00033 #include "mimas/constants.h"
00034 
00035 using namespace lubyk;
00036 
00037 #include <QtCore/QFileSystemWatcher>
00038 #include <QtGui/QMouseEvent>
00039 #include <QtCore/QPoint>
00040 
00041 #include <iostream>
00042 
00043 
00044 namespace mimas {
00045 
00050 class FileObserver : public QFileSystemWatcher, public ThreadedLuaObject
00051 {
00052   Q_OBJECT
00053 
00054 public:
00055   FileObserver() {
00056     QObject::connect(this, SIGNAL(fileChanged(QString)),
00057                      this, SLOT(pathChangedSlot(QString)));
00058 
00059     //QObject::connect(this, SIGNAL(directoryChanged(QString)),
00060     //                 this, SLOT(pathChangedSlot(QString)));
00061     MIMAS_DEBUG_CC
00062   }
00063 
00064   ~FileObserver() {
00065     MIMAS_DEBUG_GC
00066   }
00067 
00068   void addPath(const char *path) {
00069     QFileSystemWatcher::addPath(QString::fromUtf8(path));
00070   }
00071 
00072   void removePath(const char *path) {
00073     QFileSystemWatcher::removePath(QString::fromUtf8(path));
00074   }
00075 
00076 private slots:
00077   // connected to the pathChanged signal
00078         void pathChangedSlot(const QString &path) {
00079     lua_State *L = lua_;
00080 
00081     if (!pushLuaCallback("pathChanged")) return;
00082     lua_pushstring(L, path.toUtf8().data());
00083     // <func> <self> <path>
00084     int status = lua_pcall(L, 2, 0, 0);
00085 
00086     if (status) {
00087       // cannot raise an error here...
00088       fprintf(stderr, "Error in 'pathChanged' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00089     }
00090   }
00091 };
00092 
00093 } // mimas
00094 #endif // LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_FILE_OBSERVER_H
